column2: # SYNTAX OF lm(): lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + ... xn, data)
my_ols <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp + gear + am, mtcars)
lm(formula = mpg ~ wt + hp + gear + am, data = mtcars)
# Produce a summary table of the results.
lm(formula = mpg ~ wt + hp + gear + am, data = mtcars)
